body_html: This would be huge for using tensorflow in production for us (airbnb). We wouldn't even need to use the complicated tracing approach they used for pytorch since Tensorflow has a static graph representation already.

body: This would be huge for using tensorflow in production for us (airbnb). We wouldn't even need to use the complicated tracing approach they used for pytorch since Tensorflow has a static graph representation already.
